Fishing Tutorial Guide:
First, find a fishing spot and arm yourself with patience.
Suitable fishing spots:
Giran Harbor Gludin Harbor Giran Area Outskirts of Aden Fellmere Lake Area Southern Shore of Wasteland Langk Lizardmen Dwellings (coast) Floran Area Southern Waters of the Plains of the Lizardmen Western Waters of the Ivory Tower Narsell Lake Area
